title: [Feature] Make HardhatArguments available in hardhat.config.js

labels.name: status:needs-decision
labels.description: We need to make a decision about this

body:
As far as I know, this is entirely possible, so the question is if we want to do this, and how. We also need to think carefully if this doesn't introduce weird edge cases (I believe it doesn't, but I haven't thought too much about it).

I'm inclined to think this would be a good idea, since many times users have wanted to do something in the config based on the selected network.
